name: planet4-homepage
description: A basic microsite for Greenpeace Planet 4 project

scripts.static-prod: replace-in-file '/{{ base_url }}/g' 'https://storage.googleapis.com/planet4-homepage/' dist/index.html,dist/features/index.html --isRegex; replace-in-file '/{{ domain }}/g' 'https://planet4.greenpeace.org/' dist/index.html,dist/features/index.html --isRegex
scripts.static-dev: replace-in-file '/{{ base_url }}/g' '/' dist/index.html,dist/features/index.html --isRegex ; replace-in-file '/{{ domain }}/g' '/' dist/index.html,dist/features/index.html --isRegex
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-js && cp index.html dist/ && cp -r img/. dist/img/ && cp -r features/. dist/features/
